Source.Name: xdg-dbus-proxy
Source.Description: xdg-dbus-proxy is a filtering proxy for D-Bus connections. It was originally part of the flatpak project, but it has been broken out as a standalone module to facilitate using it in other contexts.

Package.Name: xdg-dbus-proxy
Package.Description: xdg-dbus-proxy is a filtering proxy for D-Bus connections. It was originally part of the flatpak project, but it has been broken out as a standalone module to facilitate using it in other contexts.
